scripts.clean: rm -fR _docs/* docs/*.md docs/**/*.md docs/**/**/*.md docs/**/**/**/*.md docs/**/**/**/**/*.md
scripts.build-legal: npm run clean-legal; cp -r ~/Documents/guld/legal/* docs/; npm run docs; cp -fR _docs/* ~/io/http/guld.legal/; cp css/legal.css ~/io/http/guld.legal/css/legal.css; rm ~/io/http/guld.legal/template.html;
scripts.build-info: npm run clean-info; cp -r ~/Documents/guld/legal/* docs/; npm run docs; cp -fR _docs/* ~/io/http/guld.legal/; cp css/legal.css ~/io/http/guld.legal/css/legal.css; rm ~/io/http/guld.legal/template.html;
